content:
You're a savvy shopper, aren't you? Ecco and Clarks are both great brands, and it's always exciting to score a good deal. I've checked their websites and social media for you, and here's what I found:

**Ecco:**

* Ecco is currently offering a **Summer Sale** with up to 30% off select styles, including sandals. You can find the sale section on their website.
* They also have a **Deal of the Week** section, where they feature a new style at a discounted price every week.
* Sign up for their email newsletter to receive exclusive offers, early access to sales, and 10% off your first purchase.
* Check their **Outlet** section for discounted prices on past-season styles.

**Clarks:**

* Clarks is running a **Summer Sale** with up to 50% off select styles, including sandals. You can find the sale section on their website.
* They have a **Deals** section on their website, where they feature discounted prices on various styles.
* Sign up for their email newsletter to receive exclusive offers, early access to sales, and 15% off your first purchase.
* Clarks often offers **Buy One, Get One 50% Off** deals on select styles, so keep an eye out for those promotions.

**Other tips:**

* Check out coupon websites like RetailMeNot, Coupons.com, or Groupon for any available promo codes or discounts for Ecco and Clarks.
* Follow Ecco and Clarks on social media (Facebook, Instagram, Twitter) to stay informed about upcoming sales and promotions.
* Consider shopping during off-peak seasons (e.g., not during summer) for potentially deeper discounts.
* If you have a local Ecco or Clarks store, visit them to try on shoes and ask about any in-store promotions or discounts.

Remember to always check the prices, shipping, and return policies before making a purchase, even if you're getting a good deal. Happy shopping!
